title: Snacktime: Llama At A Wedding
dc:creator: WBUR
description: “What are the dimensions of an adult llama?” asked a Redditor called Mrs. Sam Handwich in the "No Stupid Questions" community. "I've been hired to make a tuxedo for a llama and I don't have its measurements," she added. We get to the bottom of this now-famous Reddit post.
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: Snacktime: Llama At A Wedding
itunes:summary: “What are the dimensions of an adult llama?” asked a Redditor called Mrs. Sam Handwich in the "No Stupid Questions" community. "I've been hired to make a tuxedo for a llama and I don't have its measurements," she added. We get to the bottom of this now-famous Reddit post.
itunes:subtitle: “What are the dimensions of an adult llama?” asked a Redditor called Mrs. Sam Handwich in the "No Stupid Questions" community. "I've been hired to make a tuxedo for a llama and I don't have it's measurements," she added. The Endless Thread team gets to the bottom of this now-famous Reddit story.

media:content.media:description: Mendl Weinstock (middle) and the llama he brought to his sister's (left) wedding (courtesy Mendl Weinstock)

content:encoded: “What are the dimensions of an adult llama?” asked a Redditor called Mrs. Sam Handwich in the "No Stupid Questions" community. "I've been hired to make a tuxedo for a llama and I don't have its measurements," she added. We get to the bottom of this now-famous Reddit post.
